#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define trace(x) cerr << #x << ": " << x << " ";
#define tracen(x) cerr << #x << ": " << x << "\n";

typedef long long lolo;
typedef unsigned long long ulolo;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
#define fi first
#define se second

const int INF = 1e9 + 23;
const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;
const int MAXN = 500 + 100;

int arr[MAXN];

int main()
{
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
  int t, n;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
      cin >> arr[i];
    }
    sort(arr, arr + n);
    for (int i = 0, j = n - 1; i <= j; ++i, --j) {
      cout << arr[j] << " ";
      if (i != j) {
        cout << arr[i] << " ";
      }
    }
    cout << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

// g++ -W -Wkk -Wextra -pedantic -std=c++11 -o p main.cpp
